content: लालस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Ardently longing for, eagerly desirous of, hankering after; प्रणामलालसाः <ls>K. 14</ls>; ईशानसंदर्शनलालसानां <ls>Ku. 7. 56</ls>, <ls>Śi. 4. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Taking pleasure in, devoted to, fond of, absorbed in; विलासलालसं <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; शोक°, मृगया° &c. --सः = लालसा. <ab>q. v.</ab> below.
